inclusion.criterion: Patient must be 20 years or older
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient must have HCV GT1 infection combined with HBV infection.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must be serum HCV RNA detectable, anti-HCV positive, HBsAg positive and HBeAg negative.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient has previously failed treatment with PEG-IFN-α 2a or 2b/RBV for minimum of 12 weeks of treatment.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient must have compensated liver disease consistent with CHC and/or CHB, and no other etiology.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient meets all of the requirements and none of the contra-indications for treatment with PEG-IFN alpha-2b/RBV or boceprevir defined in the labels for the PEG-IFN/RBV to be used in combination with boceprevir.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient is able and willing to provide signed informed consent (prepared by and administered by the physician) as required by local country requirements.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Mixed genotypes including HCV genotype other than genotype 1.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patient has received boceprevir, narlaprevir, telaprevir, or any other HCV protease inhibitor treatment.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patient has evidence of decompensated liver disease including but not limited to, a history or presence of clinical ascites, bleeding varices, or hepatic encephalopathy.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patient meets any of the following exclusionary hematologic and biochemical criteria (documentation required) Hemoglobin <12 gm/dL for females and <13 gm/dL for males Neutrophils <1500/mm3 Platelets <100,000/mm3
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patient has an organ transplant other than cornea or hair.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patient is co-infected with human immunodeficiency virus (HIV)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patient requires or is anticipated to require any of the following prohibited medications: midazolam, pimozide, amiodarone, flecainide, propafenone, quinidine, and ergot derivatives
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patient with clinical diagnosis or evidence of substance abuse involving alcohol, intravenous drugs, inhalational psychotropics, narcotics, cocaine prescription or over-the-counter drugs.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 55-year-old man diagnosed with HCV 2 years ago and recent coinfection with HBV. On IFN, RBV and direct antiviral drugs for the past 6 months.
